text: José María Gil-Robles y Gil-Delgado (17 June 1935 — 13 February 2023) was a Spanish politician. He was formerly a member of the European Parliament in the European People's Party group. He was President of the European Parliament from 1997 to 1999. From 2009 to 2014, he was president of the Jean Monnet Foundation for Europe. Gil-Robles died on 13 February 2023 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Politicians from Madrid Category:Presidents of the European Parliament Category:MEPs for Spain
title: José María Gil-Robles
